content: base to the flat part of the raised base and attach with a tapestry needle and appropriately colored yarn i e yarn that won t show 2 attach circular toggles as described in directions for circular toggles using tapestry needle and appropriately colored yarn 3 attach lens to flat part of ocular goggle using a tapestry needle and appropriately colored yarn do this for both lenses 4 center ocular goggle where eyes would be on the smaller flat base which is attached to the raised base and sew on with tapestry needle and appropriately colored yarn when you ve sewn about half way around the circumference of each circle stuff ocular goggle with polyfil and continue sewing until attached do this with both ocular goggles 5 center raised base on base leaving approximately 1 cm of lip all the way around and attach to base using tapestry needle and appropriately colored yarn stuff raised base with polyfil as you go special notes 1 hide as many ends as possible when sewing either in the stuffed bits or underneath parts and weave in the rest 2 be careful not to overstuff the stuffed bits or you end up with a madonna pointy bra look-a-like rather than a goggle 3 consider crocheting with two strands together for the whole pattern to add more dimension and stiffness 4 consider making the circumference of the ocular goggle bigger if it would look more aesthetically pleasing 5 if you make the circumference of the ocular goggle bigger you should probably do row 7 of the smaller flat base twice 6 play around with the colors as much as you like to personalize them i just chose these colors to be more horrible-y 7 consider sewing a wide band of elastic to the inside of the straps to make them fit more snugly and if you do this you could make the straps only as long as would fit exactly around your head and then sew the ends of the straps together i prefer the ease of making them extra long and tying them for the moment 8 also if you find that the colors i used make it so the detailing of the goggles is too hard to see just change the charcoal grey up to a lighter grey not too much lighter though or it will be too close to the grey heather i nichole m
